entry.title: Dynabrade 78861 - Steel Crimped Wire Radial Wheel Brush (2 Inch x .0118 x 7/16 Inch)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Crimped Wire Wheel Radial Brush
Price: 17.51

[shortdesc]
  • Crimped Wire Radial Wheel Brush 2 Inch (51 mm) Dia
  • x .0118 x 7/16 Inch Steel
  • Include 00001721 Safety Sheet For Each
  • Carbon Steel wire is the most durable power brush fill material for metalworking and heavy duty cleaning applications
  • Utilizes heat treated, high tensile steel wire for superior fatigue resistance and aggressive brishing action
  • Crimped wire construciton allows individual wire filaments to support each other for light to mefdium duty applications.
  • Features an integral 1/4 Inch shank for safe operation at high speeds and for quick mounting into a collet or chuck

entry.title: Sia Siaflex 5659.4836.0120 - Self Adhesive Paper (PSA) Discs 5 Inch 1948 Material Aluminum Oxide Stearate in 120 Grit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sia
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 0.34

[shortdesc]
  • flexible and versatile
  • As a cost-effective all-round series for wet and dry sanding, 1948 siaflex produces outstanding results in all available grits and in a variety of automotive applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Sia
    Line Siaflex
    Backing Material Paper
    Color Blue
    Diameter 5 Inch
    Dimensions 5xNH
    Grit 120
    Material 1948
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • High stock removal with good finish
  • Highly flexible and adaptable to contours
  • Minimal clogging thanks to open coating in 220 - 600 grit range
  • Long lifetime
  • Suitable for general use in dry and wet sanding applications
  • Versatile all-round product with an attractive range of options

    • Suggested Application

  • Sanding down coatings and impurities
  • Sanding out unevenness at the edges of repaired surfaces
  • Flatting of body filler and primer filler
  • Fine sanding of primer filler
  • Keying old and new lacquers
  • Removing orange peel effect and dust inclusions
    		•

entry.title: Carborundum Premier Red 18113 - Self Adhesive Paper (PSA) Discs 5 Inch Material Aluminum Oxide in 800 Grit 05539518113
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 47.29

[shortdesc]
  • Best choice for sanding all paints, primers, plastics and fiberglass
  • Also suited for sealer and wash coats in wood furniture.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Premier Red
    Backing Material Paper
    Diameter 5 Inch
    Dimensions 5xNH
    Grit 800
    Material Premier Red
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • P-graded, heat-treated, aluminum oxide abrasive provides 30% to 50% faster cut rate than other discs with consistent scratch pattern and finish
  • Unique fiber-reinforced, B-weight, latex-saturated backing provides a 50% 60% improvement in tear strength, superior resistance to delamination
  • Special, undyed stearate oversize and an open coat provides superior load resistance and extended life with no color transfer to work
  • Pressure-sensitive adhesive backing for easy application and removal
    		•
